thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 19 of 3219
thread.title: Stuart Rose

author: Stuart Rose
title: Stuart Rose
text:
Great choice of cars and found exactly what I wanted for my Orlando holiday at a great price. If you're planning an American holiday you must have a classic American car and I found exactly what I was searching for in the shape of a Lincoln Towncar at a reduced rate.
Easy booking procedure made the whole process quick and effortless. Confirmation e mails immediately with full information with no hidden extras.
Would definitely use again.
